scripts.dev: cd generator && ts-node generator.ts && cd .. && concurrently --kill-others "npm run generate" "cd client && npm run dev" "cd server && npm run dev"
scripts.build: cd generator && ts-node generator.ts && cd ..\client && npm run build && cd ..\server && npm run build
scripts.install-all: npm install && cd server && npm install && cd ..\client && npm install
